rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Minstrel of the Fantastical dies, search your library for a planeswalker with mana value equal or less than Minstrel of the Fantastical’s power, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it’s not your turn, that planeswalker phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]
